mapper.select: SELECT RESOURCE_ID, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_PATTERN, DESCRIPTION, RESOURCE_TYPE, SORT_ORDER, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM T2_SECURED_RESOURCES ORDER BY RESOURCE_ID ASC

SELECT T2SR.RESOURCE_ID AS RESOURCE_ID, T2SR.RESOURCE_NAME AS RESOURCE_NAME, T2SR.RESOURCE_PATTERN AS RESOURCE_PATTERN, T2SR.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, T2SR.RESOURCE_TYPE AS RESOURCE_TYPE, T2SR.SORT_ORDER AS SORT_ORDER, T2SR.CREATE_DATE AS CREATE_DATE, T2SR.MODIFY_DATE AS MODIFY_DATE, T2SRR.RESOURCE_ID AS T2SRR_RESOURCE_ID, T2SRR.AUTHORITY AS T2SRR_AUTHORITY FROM T2_SECURED_RESOURCES T2SR LEFT JOIN T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE T2SRR ON T2SR.RESOURCE_ID = T2SRR.RESOURCE_ID ORDER BY T2SR.RESOURCE_ID ASC
SELECT RESOURCE_ID, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_PATTERN, DESCRIPTION, RESOURCE_TYPE, SORT_ORDER, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM T2_SECURED_RESOURCES WHERE RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId}

SELECT T2SR.RESOURCE_ID AS RESOURCE_ID, T2SR.RESOURCE_NAME AS RESOURCE_NAME, T2SR.RESOURCE_PATTERN AS RESOURCE_PATTERN, T2SR.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, T2SR.RESOURCE_TYPE AS RESOURCE_TYPE, T2SR.SORT_ORDER AS SORT_ORDER, T2SR.CREATE_DATE AS CREATE_DATE, T2SR.MODIFY_DATE AS MODIFY_DATE, T2SRR.RESOURCE_ID AS T2SRR_RESOURCE_ID, T2SRR.AUTHORITY AS T2SRR_AUTHORITY FROM T2_SECURED_RESOURCES T2SR LEFT JOIN T2_SECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE T2SRR ON T2SR.RESOURCE_ID = T2SRR.RESOURCE_ID WHERE T2SR.RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId}
mapper.update: UPDATE T2_SECURED_RESOURCES SET RESOURCE_NAME = #{resourceName}, RESOURCE_PATTERN = #{resourcePattern}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, RESOURCE_TYPE = #{resourceType}, SORT_ORDER = #{sortOrder}, MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate} WHERE RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T2_SECURED_RESOURCES ( RESOURCE_ID, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_PATTERN, DESCRIPTION, RESOURCE_TYPE, SORT_ORDER, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES ( #{resourceId}, #{resourceName}, #{resourcePattern}, #{description}, #{resourceType}, #{sortOrder}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate} )
